AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Colony Survivor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in an off-world colony. [PAWN_pronoun] lived with the bare minimum allowed in space and had nothing [PAWN_pronoun] could really call [PAWN_possessive] own. Life was sordid and bleak. Then the USCM recruiter came and [PAWN_nameDef] felt like [PAWN_pronoun] had found a purpose.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: USCM SOJA-E
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up on the mean streets of [PAWN_possessive] home-city, [PAWN_nameDef] learned that [PAWN_pronoun] had to fight to survive. At a young age [PAWN_pronoun] was already surrounded by gang violence and drugs, and saw no hope for a better future. Eventually, [PAWN_nameDef] went to juvenile prison and at the age of 17 a recruiter showed up standing next to [PAWN_possessive] probation officer. The Service-Or-Jail Act. A way out had shown its face. [PAWN_nameDef] agreed and was quickly shipped off to MEPS.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Colonial Marine
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] found purpose in the USCM. [PAWN_pronoun] went to Basic Training and found a new family. [PAWN_pronoun] even got matching tattoos with [PAWN_possessive] squadmates and is now a proud member of the USCM Corps, ready to serve.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Blooded Marine
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had an encounter with the illusive Yautja. Fortunately for [PAWN_objective], [PAWN_pronoun] survived and, in the process, impressed the Hunter race. [PAWN_pronoun] was marked by an Ancient and allowed to live as a reward. [PAWN_nameDef] still carries the mark with [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Corporate Liaison
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] joined the corporate branch of Weyland-Yutani, which is involved in many of the momentous decisions behind the money-making initiatives of the company.\n\nUnfortunately, poor first impressions lead to [PAWN_nameDef] being assigned as a liaison for a frontier mercenary group under Weyland-Yutani's payroll. Being confined to a cramped corporate office with a group of soldiers who cared for little beyond their pay lead to [PAWN_nameDef] being ignored at best, and openly disparaged at worst. The military environment rubbed off on [PAWN_objective], either as a minimal sign of camaraderie, or due to a need for [PAWN_nameDef] to defend [PAWN_objective]self from the mercenaries themselves.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Xenomorph Survivor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived out on a outer rim colony before a ship burst through the atmosphere and crashed near the colony grounds. A search team was sent out but communications with them quickly went silent. Not long after the colony was attacked by xenomorphs, it was a bloodbath. [PAWN_nameDef] was the only survivor of the attack, rescued by the USCM just in time. [PAWN_pronoun] decided to join the USCM to help as much as [PAWN_pronoun] could. But the nightmares make it hard to focus.\n\nPTSD the doc called it.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: M56 Smart Gun Operator
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Smart Gun System Operator. While most of the Marines can put their Pulse Rifles on burst and keep shooting, that may not be enough. [PAWN_title]s are trained in the time-honored tactic of accuracy through volume.\n\n"I've got a bullet with your name on it and I'm gonna keep firing until I find which one!"
